ttbasetheme.slider.title: Allow Slider module for TT Base Theme Extension
ttbasetheme.slider.description: The Tavano Team Slider module lets you add a carousel of images and/or videos to your website using Site Management Tools. Slider lets you add a carousel of up to 4 images to your web store. You can select various layout settings such as image overlay, text, and call-to-action buttons to give your slideshow the appearance and behavior you want without editing Sass or HTML templates.
